titleStmt.title: A speech lately made by a noble peer of the realm
titleStmt.author: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F.S. at the Elephant and Castle near the Royal Exchange in Cornhil,

notesStmt.note: A reply to remarks offered by several lords to a speech previously made by Lord Shaftesbury in debate on the King's speech.
Attributed to the Earl of Shaftesbury. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Imprint from colophon; complete date of publication from other copy.
Imperfect: cropped, with loss of text and part of imprint date.
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
